page.title: 10FACTORIES (1)
page.content: There is no traditional industry left in New Hartley. After the Pit Disaster at the Hester Pit a new colliery was built but has long since been worked-out. Only the buildings of the{Seaton Delaval Colliery}remain at the{west}end of the village. This is where the modern industry is situated. The following types of factory can be found: Haulage Contractor (x3) Car Repairs (x2) Caravan sales (x1) Electric motor rewinds (x1) Carpet Sales (x3) Demolition Contractor (x1) Freezer Centre (x1) Pipe Manufacturer (x1) Builder (x1) Furniture Manufacturer (x1) Polystyrene Recycling (x1) (CONTINUED)
